github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: use JavaScript for all code. use camelCase for variable names, PascalCase for class names. Use spaces for indentation. Use single quotes for strings. Use 2 spaces for indentation.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commits format with the appropriate emoji. Be extremely detailed with the file changes and the reason for the change. Add autogenerated by copilot at the end of the commit message.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: All classes should have comments. Functions should have comments. Variables SHOULD NOT have comments.

github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Use verbose class names that clearly state the test case. Use the AAA pattern for test cases. Arrange, Act, Assert.
